build.buildCommand: curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" && uv sync

deploy.startCommand: export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" && uv run alembic upgrade head && uv run uvicorn backend.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port ${PORT:-8080}
